urls.title: Under Armour Portrush 2.0 Waterproof Jacket
urls.description: PGA Professional Verulam Golf Club What we love about this jacket is that you get complete waterproof protection but with plenty of breathability. The combination of 100% waterproof protection and lots of breathability means you’re dry and warm without ever feeling stuffy or uncomfortable. That means you can just focus on your game; playing better and enjoying your round more. Key features and benefits: 100% waterproof protection with taped seams Breathable 2.5-layer fabric for lasting comfort UA Storm

urls.title: Mizuno JPX923 Hot Metal Irons
urls.description: PGA Professional Verulam Golf Club The high launch and controllable landing angles of these irons give you the consistent performance we all crave from our irons. The seamless cup face is constructed to deliver deep centre of gravity, which in turn allows you to get the ball high in the air and gain control over the landing as you go for greens. urls.title: Srixon UltiSoft Golf Balls (2022)
urls.description: PGA Professional Verulam Golf Club The way this golf ball transitions from soft-to-firm means you get both distance off the tee and feel around the greens. The FastLayer core is a piece of engineering brilliance as it transitions from soft to firm for both soft greenside feel and off-the-tee distance. Add a cover that increases spin and you’ve got incredible all-round performance. Key features and benefits: FastLayer Core provides a soft centre that allows soft feel around the greens Soft centre transition

data.text:
The perfect winter golf ball? The #Srixon UltiSoft golf ball features a soft centre that transitions into a firm outer edge for plenty of distance. That is a perfect combo in our eyes ⚖️ #VerulamProShop

👉 https://t.co/SoRrxpPD9z https://t.co/kwQ8oG30Yo

urls.title: PING i230 irons
urls.description: PGA Professional Verulam Golf Club Between MicroMax grooves, progressive blade lengths and strategic weighting, these irons give you outstanding performance from the longest to the most delicate shots. The elastomer insert used in these irons saves a huge amount of weight, which PING could then redistribute to create lower CG for better launch conditions and high MOI for added forgiveness. All of a sudden, you’ve got players-iron feel and looks with the confidence we all want over every shot. Key

data.text:

urls.title: PING 2023 Putters
urls.description: PGA Professional Verulam Golf Club The most astonishing thing about PING’s 2023 putter range is that it offers up ELEVEN different models and all of them are excellent. PING’s range includes a shallow-milled face, a smooth-milled face, a PEBAX face insert surrounded by shallow milling or a PEBAX insert surrounded by smooth milling. Each one offers a unique feeling at impact, so it’s down to what you prefer. Key features and benefits: Four different face technologies for different feel at impact in

data.text:

Busy week, project work has started…
Maintenance yard access changed to allow for new borehole feed into holding tank, bunkers moving at an increasing pace, new tee has been stripped ready for building and irrigation found to install valves and heads. @VerulamProShop @VerulamGC https://t.co/1PzTgmM9E1

Week one complete of phase 1 of our bunker upgrade project. 
Really good progress from Conor Walsh’s team & the vision JAMES EDWARDS, EIGCA @EDI__ADI has helped us create. Looking forward to seeing the plans come to life over the next few weeks. https://t.co/YJx812mwNU
